metadata.title: CVE-2024-35826 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: block:Fix page refcounts for unaligned buffers in __bio_release_pages() Fix anincorrect number of pages being released for buffers that do not start atthe beginning of a page.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
